titlestmt.title: Description of Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library, Halper 37: Haftarah for the first day of Passover, Targum Pseudo-Jonathan

publicationstmt.publisher: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

notesstmt.note: Vowel points appear to be supplied by later hand; headline in enlarged characters, under decorative symbols; Under the Hebrew heading: לרא]שון של פסח ביהשע], Joshua V 2-12 [היה ע[וד, with Aramaic Targum after each verse; a few errant readings; A text break is signified after V 8, vowel points supplied only for Hebrew text.
Condition: orn. dev.; losses in upper interior and both lower corners.

msidentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

mscontents.textlang: Official Aramaic (700-300 BCE); Imperial Aramaic (700-300 BCE); Hebrew

msitem.title: Haftarah for the first day of Passover, Targum Pseudo-Jonathan

layoutdesc.layout: Columns: 1; lines: 21 (recto: heading + 19; lines); ruling method: left rule justified by stretching last character or with filler symbol.

history.provenance: Cairo Genizah Collection (University of Pennsylvania. Center for Advanced Judaic Studies. Library).
